message_1: Suppose we have a message "HELLO" that needs to be sent securely. Using the SHA-256 cryptographic hash function, what is the hash value of this message?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "HELLO", we can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the hash value:

2cf24dba5fb0a30e26e83b2ac5b9e29e1b161e5c1fa7425e73043362938b9824
